name: Hentai Room
description:
Hentai Room is a game in that you can relax. If you want to pass the time, then try the easy mode, but if you are serious you can test yourself in the hard mode or play in Medium. There are 55 arts available for you.

Game Features

  • 55 Arts
  • 55 Achievements for Each Girl
  • Relaxing music
  • 3 difficulty modes
